definitions.definition: A city , a municipal and regional administrative centre , an as well as, a raion of Donetsk Oblast in the Donbas region, in eastern Ukraine , on the Kalmius river.
An oblast in the Donbas region, in eastern Ukraine . Seat: Kramatorsk ; former seat: Donetsk (prior to the Donbas War, where Russia occupied and set up puppet countries)

A self-declared country in Donetsk Oblast in the Donbas region, in eastern Ukraine . Seat: Donetsk ; occupying 1/3 of the province, but claiming all the province, before the Russian invasion of all of Ukraine in 2022.
A town in Rostov Oblast, Russia , on the Donets river.
